TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit EnumConverter extends System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter

summary.span: 提供型別轉換子 (Type Converter) 將 物件與其他各種表示相互轉換。

span.span: Provides a type converter to convert objects to and from various other representations.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個轉換器只能轉換列舉物件與字串。This converter can only convert an enumeration object to and from a string. 類別提供屬性來取得可以用來排序列舉值的介面。The class provides the property to get an interface that can be used to sort the values of the enumeration. 根據預設，在檔案中出現的順序排序列舉值。By default, the enumeration values are sorted in the order they appear in the file. 如需型別轉換子的詳細資訊，請參閱基底類別和[How to： 實作類型轉換器](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/90373a3f-d8c8-492d-841c-945d62393c56)。For more information about type converters, see the base class and [How to: Implement a Type Converter](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/90373a3f-d8c8-492d-841c-945d62393c56). > [!NOTE] > 您絕對不要建立的執行個體。You should never create an instance of an . 請改為呼叫 類別的 方法。Instead, call the method of the class. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱中的範例基底類別。For more information, see the examples in the base class. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會將轉換類型的變數為字串，反之亦然。The following code example converts a variable of type to a string, and vice versa. 這個範例需要您已經宣告呼叫`Servers`，而且它有下列成員：The example requires that you have declared an called `Servers` and that it has the following members: ``` Windows=1, Exchange=2, BizTalk=3 ``` [!code-cpp[Converters#12](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Converters/CPP/converters.cpp#12)] [!code-csharp[Converters#12](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Converters/CS/converters.cs#12)] [!code-vb[Converters#12](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Converters/VB/converters.vb#12)]

para.span: 如果您想要為不同的順序排序的值，會覆寫屬性。

span.span: If you want to sort the values into a different order, override the property.

MemberSignature.Value: public override bool CanConvertFrom (System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext context, Type sourceType);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance bool CanConvertFrom(class System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext context, class System.Type sourceType) cil managed
Public Overrides Function CanConvertFrom (context As ITypeDescriptorContext, sourceType As Type) As Boolean
public: override bool CanConvertFrom(System::ComponentModel::ITypeDescriptorContext ^ context, Type ^ sourceType);

span.span: An that provides a format context.
A that represents the type you wish to convert from.

summary.span: 取得值，指出這個轉換子是否可以使用指定的內容，將指定來源型別中的物件轉換成列舉型別物件。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether this converter can convert an object in the given source type to an enumeration object using the specified context.

returns.span: 如果這個轉換子可以執行轉換，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if this converter can perform the conversion; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個轉換器只能轉換列舉物件與字串。This converter can only convert an enumeration object to and from a string. 可以使用 `context` 參數來擷取環境的其他資訊，而這個轉換子就是從這個環境叫用的。The `context` parameter can be used to extract additional information about the environment this converter is being invoked from. 這可能是 `null`，所以一定要檢查。This can be `null`, so always check. 甚至，內容物件上的屬性可能會傳回 `null`。Also, properties on the context object can return `null`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以使用 `context` 參數來擷取環境的其他資訊，而這個轉換子就是從這個環境叫用的。The `context` parameter can be used to extract additional information about the environment this converter is being invoked from. 這可能是 `null`，所以一定要檢查。This can be `null`, so always check. 甚至，內容物件上的屬性可能會傳回 `null`。Also, properties on the context object can return `null`.

para.span: 請覆寫這個方法以提供您自己的轉換需求。

span.span: Override this method to provide your own conversion requirements.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個轉換器只能轉換列舉物件與字串。This converter can only convert an enumeration object to and from a string. 可以使用 `context` 參數來擷取環境的其他資訊，而這個轉換子就是從這個環境叫用的。The `context` parameter can be used to extract additional information about the environment this converter is being invoked from. 這可能是 `null`，所以一定要檢查。This can be `null`, so always check. 甚至，內容物件上的屬性可能會傳回 `null`。Also, properties on the context object can return `null`.

The conversion cannot be performed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個轉換器只能轉換列舉物件與字串。This converter can only convert an enumeration object to and from a string. 可以使用 `context` 參數來擷取環境的其他資訊，而這個轉換子就是從這個環境叫用的。The `context` parameter can be used to extract additional information about the environment this converter is being invoked from. 這可能是 `null`，所以一定要檢查。This can be `null`, so always check. 甚至，內容物件上的屬性可能會傳回 `null`。Also, properties on the context object can return `null`. > [!NOTE] > 行為列舉型別是否具有相同值的多個欄位，方法是未定義。The behavior of the method is undefined if the enumeration has multiple fields with the same value.

span.span: An that provides a format context.

summary.span: 針對這個驗證程式設計目標的資料型別，取得由該資料型別的標準值所組成的集合。

span.span: Gets a collection of standard values for the data type this validator is designed for.

returns.span: 會保留標準有效值的集合，如果資料型別不支援標準值集合，則為 。

span.span: A that holds a standard set of valid values, or if the data type does not support a standard set of values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以使用 `context` 參數來擷取環境的其他資訊，而這個轉換子就是從這個環境叫用的。The `context` parameter can be used to extract additional information about the environment this converter is being invoked from. 這可能是 `null`，所以一定要檢查。This can be `null`, so always check. 甚至，內容物件上的屬性可能會傳回 `null`。Also, properties on the context object can return `null`. > [!NOTE] > 所有的欄位會標示列舉型別的設`false`將不會傳回。Any fields of the enumeration that are marked with set to `false` will not be returned.
